PageTitle: display bgp flow vpnv4 all routing-table peer advertised-routes
FuncDef: The display bgp flow vpnv4 all routing-table peer advertised-routes command displays information about BGP VPNv4 Flow Specification routes.
CLIs: display bgp flow vpnv4 all routing-table peer <ipv4-address> advertised-routes
display bgp flow vpnv4 all routing-table peer <ipv4-address> received-routes [ active ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about routes advertised to a specified peer.
-

Displays information about routes received from a specified peer.
-

Displays information about the active routes received from a specified peer.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp flow vpnv4 all routing-table peer 10.21.2.1 advertised-routes
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about BGP VPNv4 Flow Specification routes, run the display bgp flow vpnv4 all routing-table peer advertised-routes command. The command output shows information about both active and inactive BGP VPNv4 Flow Specification routes.
